resources.string: Something wrong happened on Tussam server =(

This app is not official, but it consumes a public service provided by Tussam\'s web. That service is updated during the night, when buses get home and send cards info to the server. Updated info for your card can be queried in the morning. However, we are not responsible if at sometime data is not properly updated.
This card number is not valid
Add your tussam card to loop-up what\'s your credit! =) Turn back your card and introduce the 12-digit number found there, then type a name to help you identify your cards.
Â¿Do you want to recharge this card? You will be taken to Tussam website where you can type your card data and recharge it.
